Batros Marina Residences está inspirado: Batros Marina Residences is inspired by contemporary Mexican architecture. The elegant and timeless design results in a sober and elegant building, in neutral colours, which integrates harmoniously into its surroundings where its inhabitants will truly feel at home.
Batros Marina Residences colinda con uno: Batros Marina Residences adjoins one of the most famous golf courses in the country: Marina Vallarta Golf Club, an extraordinary 18-hole course designed by the famous American architect Joe Finger, framed by abundant nature, lakes and spectacular views of the mountains of the Sierra Madre and the Pacific.

Una de las características principales d: One of the main features of Caza Mabó is the presence of large windows and balconies in each of the rooms and common areas, allowing the transition between inside and outside to be smooth and natural.
